deviceTimeError.message: You cannot log in because the clock on your device is off by more than 5 minutes. Adjust the clock and try again.

permissionRequestDenied.message: You need to approve our request to access your Tunnistamo profile in order to use this service. Please try logging in again.

genericError.message: An error occured while logging in. Please try again

berthErrors.explanation: You cannot delete your information because Boat berths service needs your information for billing. Contact the customer service of Berth service to terminate your contract. After that has been done, you can try again.
berthErrors.title: The operation cannot be completed.

confirmationModal.saveMessage: The information you have changed is immediately available to the following City of Helsinki services:
confirmationModal.saveTitle: Do you want to save your changes?
confirmationModal.idleWarning: The session is about to expire. To prevent an automatic logout, select Continue
confirmationModal.idleWarningTitle: You will be logged out soon

createProfile.heading: Fill in your details to create a profile
createProfile.helpText: By creating a profile you can manage your information in one place.

deleteProfile.accept: I understand what deleting my data means and wish to proceed.
deleteProfile.explanation:
If you want to, you can delete your Helsinki profile and all the data we have stored. Once deleted, the data cannot be restored. It is therefore advisable to download your own data before deleting your profile and your own data.

After the deletion, you will be automatically logged out of this service.

If you have logged in using a third-party service provider account (e.g. Google or Facebook), that account will not be deleted.
In order to use City of Helsinki services in the future, you will need to create a new Helsinki profile.
deleteProfile.title: Do you want to delete your information?
deleteProfile.loadingServices: Searching for services connected to the profile
deleteProfile.deleteSuccessful: The Helsinki profile and all the data we hold on you have been deleted successfully!
deleteProfile.deleteFailed: The deletion failed for some reason. Please try again after a while.
deleteProfile.deleteInfoforLightAuthentication: You have services linked to your profile for which you have used strong identification. Please log out and log in again using Suomi.fi authentication to delete your data.

deleteProfileModal.explanation:
By continuing you will lose all of your stored data and you can no longer use the following City of Helsinki services:
It is recommended that you download your own data from the service before deleting it. You can download your data from all services in one go from the My Information tab.
deleteProfileModal.noServiceExplanation: By continuing you will lose all of your stored data.
deleteProfileModal.title: Are you sure you want to delete your information?
deleteProfileModal.notAllowed: You cannot delete your profile because one of the services using it needs your information, for example, for invoicing.
deleteProfileModal.genericError: The profile could not be deleted. Please try again later.
deleteProfileModal.deleteServiceFromPage: You can delete the data from these services via the <linkToServices>{{linkToServicesText}}</linkToServices> page.
deleteProfileModal.unableToDeleteServices: We cannot delete data from these services, for example due to the transaction status or storage time.
deleteProfileModal.contactServiceToDelete: If you still want to delete the data, please contact <linkToExternalServiceList >the service</linkToExternalServiceList> directly and then retry deleting the profile.

downloadData.panelText: Here you can download a file containing all the data related to you. The file contains all the data about you stored in the Helsinki profile and information about all the associated e-services.
downloadData.panelTitle: Do you want to download your information?
downloadData.extrapanelTextforLightAuthentication: You have services linked to your profile for which you have used strong identification. Please log out and log back in with Suomi.fi authentication to download your data.

navigation.language: Language: English. Change language. Vaihda kieli. Ändra språk.

login.description: A Helsinki profile will be created for you when you log in to City of Helsinki services. Through your profile, you can manage your data and view how it is used in different services.
login.title: Your profile information at one address!

nav.titleAriaLabel: Go to homepage of the Profile

notification.defaultErrorText: Something went wrong. Try again after a while.

profile.loadErrorText: Failed to retrieve profile! Try to retrieve it again or log out.

profileDeleted.message: You can recreate it later if you want. You will be logged out after {{time}} seconds.
profileDeleted.title: Your profile has been successfully removed!

profileForm.languageDescription: Tell the city your preferred language of service
profileForm.termsLabel: I have read the service's data protection notice and the city's data protection principles
profileForm.terms: Read <fileDescriptionLink>the data protection notice in Finnish</fileDescriptionLink> and  city's <dataProtectionLink>data protection principles</dataProtectionLink>

profileInformation.addressDescription: You have added this data to the Helsinki profile service or another City of Helsinki e-service yourself. We use this address information in case of weak authentication, that is, if you have logged in using something other than the Suomi.fi authentication service. You can delete the data from the Helsinki profile if you wish, in which case they will also be removed from other e-services. Do not delete the data during an ongoing e-service session.
profileInformation.addressDescriptionNoWeakAddress: You have not added a second address. We use the second address information in case of weak authentication, that is, if you have logged in using something other than the Suomi.fi authentication service.
profileInformation.addressDescriptionNoAddress: You have not added an address. We use this address information in case of weak authentication, that is, if you have logged in using something other than the Suomi.fi authentication service.
profileInformation.description: The data stored in the Helsinki profile is used in the City of Helsinki’s e-services. You can find more detailed information on the <linkToServices>{{linkToServicesText}}</linkToServices> page.
profileInformation.name: Name
profileInformation.title: My information
profileInformation.visibility: The following information about you is stored in Helsinki profile.
profileInformation.verifiedDataInformation: You can only see the official information when you have logged in using strong authentication via the Suomi.fi service. The information has been retrieved from The National Population Information System and cannot be edited via your Helsinki profile. You can check the data stored about you in the Population Information System in the <suomiFiLink>Suomi.fi web service</suomiFiLink>.
profileInformation.ariaComboBoxHelperText: Select {{field}}. Search by typing and select one option. {{requiredInfo}}
profileInformation.ariaListTitlePhones: Phone numbers that you have provided
profileInformation.noPhone: You haven't given a phone number
profileInformation.noAddress: You have not entered an address
profileInformation.noEmail: You have not entered an email address.
profileInformation.verifyEmailText: We have sent a verification email to the email address you have entered. If you did not receive the verification email, please check your junk mail folder.
profileInformation.emailInUse: The email address you entered is already in use.

serviceConnections.empty: You currently don't have any services connected to your profile.
serviceConnections.explanation: You have granted the following services the right to use the data stored on your Helsinki profile.
serviceConnections.servicePersonalData: Information which the service will know about you:
serviceConnections.title: Your services
serviceConnections.deleteConnection: Delete your data from this service
serviceConnections.connectionRemovalVerification: By continuing, you will lose all the data stored in the {{serviceName}} service and will no longer be able to use the service until you re-register to the service.
serviceConnections.connectionRemovalSuccess: All the data we had stored in the {{serviceName}} service has been deleted successfully!
serviceConnections.connectionRemovalForbidden: We cannot delete data from this service, for example due to the transaction status or storage time.
serviceConnections.connectionRemovalVerificationTitle: Are you sure you want to delete your data?
serviceConnections.connectionRemovalError: For some reason, the deletion was not successful. Please, try again later!
serviceConnections.contactServiceToDelete: If you still want to delete the data, please contact <linkToExternalServiceList >the service</linkToExternalServiceList> directly and then retry deleting the data.
serviceConnections.explanationforLightAuthentication: You can only delete data from this service if you are strongly identified. Please log out and log in again using Suomi.fi identification to delete your data.

validation.email: The value must be an email-address.
validation.maxLength: This field can be max {{max}} characters.
validation.phoneMin: The number must be at least {{min}} characters long.
validation.errorTitleForScreenReaders: The form has the following errors:
validation.countryCallingCodeRequiredIfNumber: Country code is required with phone number
validation.requiredFieldIndication: Fields marked with an * are compulsory.

identityProvider.helsinkiAccount: You are authenticated with Helsinki ID.
identityProvider.github: You are authenticated with GitHub account.
identityProvider.google: You are authenticated with Google account.
identityProvider.facebook: You are authenticated with Facebook account.
identityProvider.yletunnus: You are authenticated with Yle ID.
identityProvider.tunnistusSuomifi: You are authenticated with Suomi.fi e-Identification.

pageNotFoundText: Check the spelling of the URL (upper and lower case letters and punctuation marks). Or click the Back button on your browser to return to the previous page. You can also go to the front page via the link below.

cookies.loginCookieDescription: Required to persist the authentication session.
cookies.languageCookieDescription: Required to persist the user's chosen language.
cookies.languageGroupText: Language cookies store the language selections by the user to remember the preferred language.
cookies.mainText: This website uses required cookies to ensure the basic functionality and performance. In addition, we use targeting cookies to perform analytics.
cookies.trackingCookieDescription: This cookie is used to store a few details about the user such as the unique visitor ID.
cookies.consentStorageDescription: Cookie stores consent for using analytics cookies.

changeProfilePassword.explanationForStrongAuthentication: You can only change your password if you are strongly identified. Log out and log in again using Suomi.fi authentication to change your password.
